results.title: On your marks it's bright sparks. - Volume 1.
results.creator_credit: Mark Lamprell, Jeff Gale and Pru Donovan
results.brief_description: ‘Take Your Medicine’: Poor Alex has a cold and medical science can’t cure it but it can save a life and help people live happier lives. Sparky shows Amy and Alex exactly how. ‘My House’: Alex has built himself a house, well it’s supposed to be a house but Amy doesn’t think it is. So Sparky takes them on a discovery tour of houses around the world, above ground, underground and even underwater.

results.title: On top of the world
results.creator_credit: Raymond Hall, John Taylor and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An inspiring portrait of Glenda Watson, a young teenager with cerebral palsy who cannot walk, but who can ride a horse. She is one of a group of physically disabled people who are improving their capabilities with the help of volunteers at the Pacific Riding for the Disabled Association. This rewarding form of recreation with therapy is a welcome change for Glenda and provides the thrill of close contact with and control of another moving creature. In fact, when she’s riding, she feels “on top of the world.”

results.title: On three moon creek: Australian paintings by Gil Jamieson
results.creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
results.brief_description: Gil Jamieson’s paintings of outback Queensland life, depicting drought, fire, flood, harvest, and a rodeo. The film is animated by camera movement and accompanied by a ballad written by Tim Burstall and performed by Donald Ayrton and John Earle.

results.title: On the way to growing up: the miracle of birth
results.creator_credit: Brigham Young University and Instructional Television Services
results.brief_description: Designed to prepare the expectant parents for childbirth. Although each birth is different, each happens in a predictable sequence and learning what to expect is part of the training. Over cartoon drawings, the narrator explains the three things necessary for adequate preparation for childbirth: a positive attitude, accurate expectations and supportive techniques. The live births of three infants is recorded.

results.title: On the waves of the Adriatic
results.creator_credit: Brian McKenzie and Brian McKenzie Film Productions
results.brief_description: Melbourne filmmaker Brian McKenzie spent 5 years working on this engrossing study of a not-so-typical Brunswick household. McKenzie plays a central part as he documents the lifestyle of Graham (a youth in his 20’s), his family and friends. After having spent so long with the family, McKenzie becomes part of the furniture- a situation which enables him to dig deep into the subjects’ lives.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Brian McKenzie and Brian McKenzie Film Productions

results.title: On the waterfront [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Elia Kazan, Sam Spiegel and Columbia
results.brief_description: Filmed on location in Hoboken, New Jersey, Kazan’s film deals with trade unionism, corruption and racketeering on New York’s docks. Marlon Brando is cast as an ex-boxer who unknowingly lures a worker, planning to testify against the waterside union, to his death. His conscience drives him to redeem himself by exposing the corruption within the union hierarchy headed by Lee J. Cobb. Karl Malden and Eva Marie Saint provide the emotional and spiritual support that drive Brando to persevere in his struggle to eradicate organised crime on the waterfront and to uphold a workers right to work. Rod Steiger appears as Brando’s brother, torn between his family loyalty and loyalty to his union boss. Screenplay by Budd Schulbert based on articles by Malcolm Johnson. Photographed by Boris Kaufman. Music by Leonard Bernstein. Edited by Gene Milford. (Academy awards: Best picture, Best actor, Best supporting actress, Best cinematography, Best art direction, Best directing, Best film editing, Best screenplay)

results.title: On the Town
results.creator_credit: Stanley Donen, Gene Kelly, Arthur Freed, United Artists Corporation and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A great musical comedy which is given full treatment with fine singing and dancing. It is the story of three sailors and their girls. Starring Gene Kelly, Ann Miller and Frank Sinatra.

results.title: On the thread of a tale
results.creator_credit: Constantin Mustetea and Animation Film Studio
results.brief_description: Animated fairy tale with characters created out of a gradually unwinding ball of yarn. Depicts the adventures of Prince Charming and his fabulous horse, in search of his ladylove who has been captured by an ogre.
